languages.text: "Несколько городов-ульев сумели удержать периметры, другие пострадали сильнее... а два города полностью разорены. Разведке все еще неизвестно о судьбе миллионов людей. Скорее всего — потеряны навсегда".

"Several hive cities managed to hold their perimeters, others sustained greater losses... and two cities were completely devastated. Our intelligence still knows nothing about the fates of millions of people. There is a high likelihood that we've lost them forever."
languages.original_text: "Несколько городов-ульев сумели удержать периметры, другие пострадали сильнее... а два города полностью разорены. Разведке все еще неизвестно о судьбе миллионов людей. Скорее всего — потеряны навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "Several hive cities managed to hold their perimeters, others sustained greater losses... and two cities were completely devastated. Our intelligence still knows nothing about the fates of millions of people. There is a high likelihood that we've lost them forever."

languages.text: 「複数のハイヴシティは周辺の防衛を維持することができましたが、他の都市はより大きな損失を受け…ふたつの都市は壊滅状態となりました。何百万人もの人々がどのような運命をたどったのか、諜報部隊も把握できていません。全員、命を落とした可能性が高いでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Several hive cities managed to hold their perimeters, others sustained greater losses... and two cities were completely devastated. Our intelligence still knows nothing about the fates of millions of people. There is a high likelihood that we've lost them forever."

traits.locale_text: 「複数のハイヴシティは周辺の防衛を維持することができましたが、他の都市はより大きな損失を受け…ふたつの都市は壊滅状態となりました。何百万人もの人々がどのような運命をたどったのか、諜報部隊も把握できていません。全員、命を落とした可能性が高いでしょう」

languages.text: “几座巢都守住了阵地，但其他巢都损失惨重……有两座巢都彻底化为废墟。至于巢都中几百万居民的情况如何，我们的情报部门尚未获悉，但他们极有可能已经永远离我们而去了。”
languages.original_text: "Several hive cities managed to hold their perimeters, others sustained greater losses... and two cities were completely devastated. Our intelligence still knows nothing about the fates of millions of people. There is a high likelihood that we've lost them forever."

traits.locale_text: “几座巢都守住了阵地，但其他巢都损失惨重……有两座巢都彻底化为废墟。至于巢都中几百万居民的情况如何，我们的情报部门尚未获悉，但他们极有可能已经永远离我们而去了。”

languages.text: «Varias ciudades colmena han logrado mantener el perímetro, otras han sufrido pérdidas mayores... y dos han sido arrasadas por completo. Nuestros servicios de inteligencia siguen sin encontrar ni rastro de millones de personas. Es más probable que las hayamos perdido para siempre».
languages.original_text: "Several hive cities managed to hold their perimeters, others sustained greater losses... and two cities were completely devastated. Our intelligence still knows nothing about the fates of millions of people. There is a high likelihood that we've lost them forever."

traits.locale_text: «Varias ciudades colmena han logrado mantener el perímetro, otras han sufrido pérdidas mayores... y dos han sido arrasadas por completo. Nuestros servicios de inteligencia siguen sin encontrar ni rastro de millones de personas. Es más probable que las hayamos perdido para siempre».

languages.text: « Plusieurs cités-ruches ont réussi à résister, tandis que d'autres ont subi des pertes importantes... et deux villes ont été complètement dévastées. Nos services de renseignements sont encore incertains du statut de millions de gens. Il est fort probable qu'ils soient perdus à jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Several hive cities managed to hold their perimeters, others sustained greater losses... and two cities were completely devastated. Our intelligence still knows nothing about the fates of millions of people. There is a high likelihood that we've lost them forever."

traits.locale_text: « Plusieurs cités-ruches ont réussi à résister, tandis que d'autres ont subi des pertes importantes... et deux villes ont été complètement dévastées. Nos services de renseignements sont encore incertains du statut de millions de gens. Il est fort probable qu'ils soient perdus à jamais. »

languages.text: "Mehrere Makropolen konnten ihr Gebiet halten, andere erlitten schwere Verluste ... und zwei Städte wurden komplett vernichtet. Unser Geheimdienst weiß nach wie vor nichts über das Schicksal von Millionen von Menschen. Es ist sehr wahrscheinlich, dass wir sie endgültig verloren haben."
languages.original_text: "Several hive cities managed to hold their perimeters, others sustained greater losses... and two cities were completely devastated. Our intelligence still knows nothing about the fates of millions of people. There is a high likelihood that we've lost them forever."

traits.locale_text: "Mehrere Makropolen konnten ihr Gebiet halten, andere erlitten schwere Verluste ... und zwei Städte wurden komplett vernichtet. Unser Geheimdienst weiß nach wie vor nichts über das Schicksal von Millionen von Menschen. Es ist sehr wahrscheinlich, dass wir sie endgültig verloren haben."

languages.text: "Merkezî şehirlerden birkaçı, sınırlarını korumayı başardı. Diğerleriyse büyük kayıplar verdi... İki şehrimiz tümüyle darmadağın edildi. İstihbarat teşkilatımız, halkımızdan milyonlarca kişinin akıbetini hâlen belirleyemedi. Onları kaybetmiş olmamız muhtemel."
languages.original_text: "Several hive cities managed to hold their perimeters, others sustained greater losses... and two cities were completely devastated. Our intelligence still knows nothing about the fates of millions of people. There is a high likelihood that we've lost them forever."

traits.locale_text: "Büyük şehirlerden birkaçı sınırlarını korumayı başardı. Diğerleriyse daha çok kayıp verdi... İki şehrimiz tümüyle darmadağın edildi. İstihbarat teşkilatımız, halkımızdan milyonlarca kişinin akıbetini hâlen bilmiyor. Onları kaybetmiş olmamız muhtemel."
